Articles.Content:
Whenever I revert to VAB to add struts or change crew the entire assembly goes under the VAB except the root part, When I try to move the root part up the entire rocket breaks down into each piece such as two fuel tank stacks are now just a bunch of fuel tanks i.e. Capsule on top, fuel tank and engine as one assembly, Capsule, Fuel tank and engine as separate assembly's. This only occurs with some craft and not with others.

I am using a I9 10900kf RTX 3070 Ventus 2x OC MSi, G.Skill 48Gb DDR4 3200Mhz Ram.

This is not allowing me to have a plesent experience building and flying craft, I have tried restarting the game many times to no avail, I hope to see this  fixed in the first update of the game.
